nodes.text: Grud was a male Houk Mandalorian mercenary who worked for the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. During the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY he was stationed at the Axial Park with many other Mandalorians who fought there. From there he recruited an Imperial hero to complete his contract in eliminating the Green Jedi who had been causing problems for the Empire's forces. He also send another Houk named Xev to follow the Imperial and make sure he fulfilled the contract as promised.
